item.description:
At this Meetup, we will be saying goodbye to Amal and wishing her well as she leaves us for a new job in Wales.
Looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come to a meetup with an international flair!
No formal presentations or homework! Just come join us for Kaffee und Kuchen and chat. Whether you are a native speaker, learned German in Germany or in college, high school or on your own, welcome! Let's have another lively meetup. Please come prepared to have a fun and interesting evening speaking with German speakers from all over the world! Countries represented have been: Germany, Austria, France, Sri Lanka, Russia, Czech Republic, Egypt, Peru, India. We meet on the first and third Thursdays of each month so in September it will be September 6 and 20..

We have many more people show up than the RSVP would indicate.
Dianne
Note: If you Mapquest Panera, it might send you to the wrong place! It is at Bishop's Corner Shopping Center, next to Staples, intersection of Routes 44 & 218.
item.name: The West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch September Meetup
